name: Corodur® LR 00-1
description: Corodur® LR 00-1 is one-component stabilizing varnish of the substrate intended for surface coatings with remnants of old unidentifiable paints, corrosion residues, etc. The varnish is rubbed into the substrate, preferably with a brush, and after drying it serves as a stable base layer for applying another layer of the coating system. It is not recommended to extend the repainting time, it must be done within 48 hours. The varnish hardens with air humidity. It is combined with colors (enamels), eg Hodopur, Corodur, Hodepox. In the coating system of a suitable composition, it is designed for both normal outdoor environments and heavy corrosion exposure.
